channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish, 19th July
item.description:
Rubbish discarded on pavement. Flies buzzing all over it. Recycling bin contaminated. This is an ongoing problem here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Streamway, Lessness Heath, London

item.title: The cement surrounding the CCTV cover is crumbling., 19th July
item.description:
